sentences.en: Mariners were also able to fix their latitude , by using an instrument called an astrolabe.
sentences.cn: 海员们还可使用星盘这种仪器确定纬度.

sentences.en: Mariners were also able to fix their latitude by using an instrument called astrolabe.
sentences.cn: 海员们还可使用星盘这种仪器确定纬度。

sentences.en: Other early instruments included the sextant and the astrolabe.
sentences.cn: 另外的早期仪器还有六分仪和星盘.

trans.tran_en: an instrument used by early astronomers to measure the altitude of stars and planets and also as a navigational aid
